name: Dark Stylish for Chrome Editor by keystoneclimber
description: A dark style for the Chrome Stylish editor
additional_info:
PLEASE READ...

For all that haven't heard, Stylish sold it's soul to SimilarWeb and has started tracking users through their browser history.  As such, I have removed the Stylish extension and have installed Stylus instead.  I will no longer be updating this style.  I would recommend ALL USERS do the same.  Stylus has many more features and configurability than Stylish and overall is a much better extension.  It even updates the page from the CSS you write in real time without having to save!!!  Seriously, give it a try.
